Litigious.Definition: Inclined to judicial contest; given to the practice of contending in law; guarrelsome; contentious; fond of litigation. Subject to contention; disputable; controvertible; debatable; doubtful; precarious. Of or pertaining to legal disputes.

Pernicious.Definition: Quick; swift to burn). Having the quality of injuring or killing; destructive; very mischievous; baleful; malicious; wicked.

Facetious.Definition: Given to wit and good humor; merry; sportive; jocular; as, a facetious companion. Characterized by wit and pleasantry; exciting laughter; as, a facetious story or reply.
